hero.title: I build practical SAP and automation data tools
hero.sub: Focus on SAP, RPA, Python, and AI-assisted workflows
hero.ctaSub: I take on focused automation builds, interface maintenance, and SAP tasks.
sap.title: SAP
sap.if1: Support and develop SAP PI/PO integrations and API mappings
sap.if2: Operate and maintain message integrations, monitor queues, retry and repair failed IDocs and messages, and correct mappings
sap.if3: Implement health checks, alerting and automated remediation
sap.if4: Analyze process failures, perform root-cause analysis and implement durable fixes and automations
sap.dev1: ABAP / ABAP Objects, Open SQL, CDS Views
sap.dev2: Dictionary, Dynpro / ALV, function groups, batch jobs
sap.dev3: SAP HANA modeling and performance optimization
sap.dev4: Debugging, performance analysis, user & authorization management
sap.m1: Map, transform and validate legacy booking and master data to target SAP schemas; perform XSD/XML checks and data reconciliation
sap.m2: Plan and execute migration cutovers: create runbooks, automate data loads, coordinate cutover tasks and run dry-runs
sap.m3: Implement rollback procedures and full audit trails; run post-migration verification and reconciliation reporting
rpa.title: RPA
rpa.l1: Planned, configured and operated automation environments including server setup
rpa.l2: Python for process automation; PowerShell for server-side automations
rpa.l3: Developed and maintained REST, SOAP and internal API integrations
rpa.l4: Integrated and trained AI/ML models with internal data
rpa.l5: Built automated workflows for email, invoices and customer data
rpa.l6: Monitoring, maintenance support and incident handling
